attributes.action: Do not change school hours and holidays
attributes.additional_details: Micheal Gove wants to change holidays and school operating hours; he seems to forget that we aren't all Education-oholics and need breaks. If this was to change you would see rebellion from those whom cannot keep up and just need a break. Furthermore if you increase the school day people become tired and their concentration fatigues . Keep it as it is there is no need to change it as we get the right balance.
